Aug. 7, 1899 D Barry Dock Contest (Class C)
Barry Dock Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
barry-dock-contest
None
Recollections of Carl Rosa
Barry Dock, Glamorgan 1st prize £5. 2nd prize £2.10s. 3rd prize £1.10s.
March contest held in conjunction with Class B on same day 1st (£1.5s.) Aberaman Silver, 2nd (15s.) Ystalyfera Temperance, 3rd (7s.) Cory's Temperance, 4th (5s.) Cwmbran.
4 bands competed.
April 18, 2012, 1:03 p.m. Jan. 11, 2017, 11:43 p.m.
1 Pentre Volunteers John Blamey
2 Caerphilly W. Turtle
3 Cwmbran Band Unknown
4 Rhiwderin Unknown
